Title: Disallows an application for a charter school to be approved if a school district is under the supervision of a state monitor or fiscal monitor
Summary: Disallows an application for a charter school to be approved if a school district has been under the supervision of a state monitor or fiscal monitor in the past five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to disallowing an application for a charter school to be approved if a school district is under the supervision of a state monitor or fiscal monitor
